Marco Aguilar

Resume

About

Hi! My name is Marco Aguilar and I'm a software developer from Los Angeles, California. I'm a software developer who is passionate about making the lives of others easier through the applications of software. I love tinkering with new technologies during my free time and collaborating with others whenever I can. My current passion is developing web and Android applications, but I'm always happy to create and build anything that encompasses the world of software.
